title: minecraft has crashed
author: rainiepak
txt_content:
為甚麼我自從裝了  http://forum.minecraft-hk.com/fo ... hlight=%A5%CD%AA%AB這個mod之後,我開minecraft ,就出了這段字出來????

This error has been saved to C:\Users\R\AppData\Roaming\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2012-08-26_00.14.57-client.txt for your convenience. Please include a copy of this file if you report this crash to anyone.

replies.author: strawmaine
replies.txt_content:
mod_LionKing (minecraft.jar) Unloaded->Errored复制代码首先，你把所有东西都打进minecraft.jar，这样的做法是不可取的

其次，你这里有安装很多需要原生modloader支持的mod，而你这里用的是forge

最后，错误出在LionKing，请重装这个mod，最好是重新下载后再安装。如果最终还是不行那就没办法了，毕竟你这个整合兼容性比较差。

replies.author: zhang.victor
replies.txt_content: 把lionking删了，我也安装了这个mod，死活不好用
